Questionnaire for Ophthalmology

Source: R/qs_ophtha.R
qs_ophtha.Rd

An example Questionnaires SDTM dataset with ophthalmology-specific questionnaire of NEI VFQ-25

Usage

qs_ophtha

Format

A data frame with 20 columns:

STUDYID

undocumented field

DOMAIN

undocumented field

USUBJID

undocumented field

QSSEQ

undocumented field

QSTESTCD

undocumented field

QSTEST

undocumented field

QSCAT

undocumented field

QSSCAT

undocumented field

QSORRES

undocumented field

QSORRESU

undocumented field

QSSTRESC

undocumented field

undocumented field

QSSTRESU

undocumented field

QSBLFL

undocumented field

QSDRVFL

undocumented field

VISITNUM

undocumented field

VISIT

undocumented field

undocumented field

QSDTC

undocumented field

QSDY

undocumented field

Source

Constructed using qs from the pharmaversesdtm package

Details

Questionnaire for Ophthalmology

An example Questionnaires SDTM dataset with ophthalmology-specific questionnaire of NEI VFQ-25

Contains a set of 29 unique Test Short Names and Test Names:

QSTESTCDQSTEST
VFQ1Your Overall Health Is
VFQ10Difficulty Noticing Objects to Side
VFQ11Difficulty Seeing How People React
VFQ12Difficulty Picking Out Own Clothes
VFQ13Difficulty Visiting With People
VFQ14Difficulty Going Out to See Movies
VFQ15Are You Currently Driving
VFQ16Difficulty Driving During Daytime
VFQ17Difficulty Driving at Night
VFQ18Driving in Difficult Conditions
VFQ19Eye Pain Keep You From Doing What You Like
VFQ2Eyesight Using Both Eyes Is
VFQ20I Stay Home Most of the Time
VFQ21I Feel Frustrated a Lot of the Time
VFQ22I Need a Lot of Help From Others
VFQ23Worry I'll Do Embarrassing Things
VFQ24Difficulty Reading Small Print
VFQ25Difficulty Figure Out Bill Accuracy
VFQ26Difficulty Shaving or Styling Hair
VFQ27Difficulty Recognizing People
VFQ28Difficulty Taking Part in Sports
VFQ29Difficulty Seeing Programs on TV
VFQ3How Often You Worry About Eyesight
VFQ4How Often Pain in and Around Eyes
VFQ5Difficulty Reading Newspapers
VFQ6Difficulty Doing Work/Hobbies
VFQ7Difficulty Finding on Crowded Shelf
VFQ8Difficulty Reading Street Signs
VFQ9Difficulty Going Down Step at Night
